column4: morning. I have an issue with Firefox 3, each time it updates, I have to make a symbolic link from /usr/lib/mozilla/plugins to /usr/lib/firefox-###/plugins    any ideas why i have to create the link? if i dont, the plugins do not show
How did you install FF3? How is it updating?
through Adept, this is in Kubuntu, but you guys talk more here...
Just making sure that you didnt install it from a tarball.
